org.eclipse.keyple.core.service

Class SmartCardService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.SmartCardService

  • public final class SmartCardService
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class SmartCardService. This singleton is the entry point of the card Proxy Service, its instance has to be called by a ticketing application in order to establish a link with a card’s application.

      • registerPlugin

        public Plugin registerPlugin(PluginFactory pluginFactory)
        Register a new plugin to be available in the platform if not registered yet
        Parameters:
        pluginFactory - plugin factory to instantiate plugin to be added
        Returns:
        Plugin : registered reader plugin
        Throws:
        KeyplePluginInstantiationException - if instantiation failed
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the plugin has already been registered.

      • unregisterPlugin

        public void unregisterPlugin(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Unregister plugin from platform
        Parameters:
        pluginName - plugin name
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the plugin or his reader(s) are already unregistered

      • isRegistered

        public boolean isRegistered(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Check weither a plugin is already registered to the platform or not
        Parameters:
        pluginName - name of the plugin to be checked
        Returns:
        true if a plugin with matching name has been registered

      • getPlugins

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Plugin> getPlugins()
        Gets the plugins.
        Returns:
        the plugin names and plugin instances map of interfaced reader’s plugins.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the plugin
        Throws:
